text: Kamavahi Jisas kumandamata kru kandɨhamaŋ ambami, Yi pirɨkɨnɨ. Harɨm na Gotɨndu tamɨŋgañɨ hɨmbañɨ ñaŋɨrandɨ, vami. Kamavahi sarɨrwayɨ ŋandi kandi lepra ha yɨwarahi kru hama ñaŋɨrandɨmi.8.3 Juda hatindu tɨkatɨka kuyu muha ambami, Kandi lepra naŋga mɨŋgandu kwɨrandɨmbɨsayɨ tɨmbusarata ndahara Gotɨndu tamɨŋgaŋgɨmbañɨ ñɨŋɨndɨrɨmana, vami. Jisas kru kandɨhamandu kwɨrandɨ hañɨ kuma tamami. Hara Jisas ñɨŋɨ mandɨmi. Kru hamaŋ mɨŋavindamami. Kamatɨhi kandi lepra ha yɨwarahi avindɨmi.
